name: .ARSCRIPT File Extension
summary: Learn about .ARSCRIPT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Script created by ArtRage, a digital painting application; saves a macro, which contains a recording of user inputs while in recording mode; used for automating common painting tasks.

content: ArtRage scripts can be created by selecting File → Record Script..., and can be run by choosing File → Play Script....

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
